page.title: 04ECOLOGY
page.content: The road from Chelmsford to Chipping Ongar (A414) is now being staightened out to minimise the risk of hazardous bends.Cozens Farm has lost half an acre of land and a hedge that dates from medevil times. The farmer tried in vain to save the hedge, but was unsuccessful. A new hedgerow is to be planted to replace the hedge. Old Wythers Farm has also lost approximately a half acre area of land. The farmer has had a new pond dug on his land in order to encourage a breeding ground for fish and other pond creatures. He has also stocked his ditch with Goldfish and Rudd.
